com.swfm.mica
Class MiEditorUniverseIncludesAllPartsLayout

java.lang.Object
  com.swfm.mica.MiEditorUniverseIncludesAllPartsLayout
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiiEditorViewportSizeLayout
public class MiEditorUniverseIncludesAllPartsLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements MiiEditorViewportSizeLayout

This class, when assigned to MiEditors (using the MiEditor#setViewportSizeLayout method), assures that all graphics in the editor are always visible (i.e. not scrolled/panned out of view). Use the #setCenterUniverseOnCenterOfContents method for further refinement.

Version:
%I% %G%
Author:
Michael L. Davis
